LanguageData.RB_InsertBeesDesc: Insert a drone in this beehouse
LanguageData.RB_InsertQueensDesc: Insert a queen bee in this beehouse
LanguageData.GU_PlaceNextToBeeHouse: The brood chamber needs to be placed adjacent to a beehouse
LanguageData.GU_NoAdjacentBeehouse: Warning: this brood chamber has no adjacent beehouse
LanguageData.GU_AdjacentBeehouseInactive: Adjacent beehouse is inactive right now
LanguageData.GU_AdjacentBeehouseRunning: The brood chamber is attached to a beehouse, and will occasionally produce drones and queens of one of the bee species present on it
LanguageData.GU_PlaceNextToBeeHouseLeft: The hybridization chamber needs to be placed adjacent to a beehouse
LanguageData.GU_NoAdjacentBeehouseHybridization: Warning: this hybridization chamber has no adjacent beehouse
LanguageData.GU_AdjacentBeehouseInactive: Adjacent beehouse is inactive right now
LanguageData.GU_AdjacentBeehouseRunningHybridization: The hybridization chamber is attached to a beehouse, and will occasionally produce mutant queens if possible
LanguageData.GU_HybridMutationsRunning: Mutations are random, happening between 1 to 4 days (currently running)
LanguageData.GU_HybridMutationsStopped: Mutations are random, happening between 1 to 4 days (currently stopped)
